title: Better Uptime
shortDescription: We call you when your website goes down
longDescription:
Better Uptime calls your phone when your website goes down. ðŸ’¥â†’ ðŸ“ž

We send you a detailed timeline of what happened and a screenshot of the error.

- ðŸ“… Schedule on-call duty rotations for your team directly from Google Calendar. No need for Pager Duty!
- ðŸ“ˆ Connect Datadog, New Relic, Grafana, Google Cloud or AWS and notify the right person on your team at the right time.
- ðŸ“§ Works great with Slack, SMS, and email, and integrates with 100+ services.
- ðŸš¨ Imagine that your website is up, but there's a critical issue that can't wait: payments not working. Have non-technical members on your team report urgent incidents to the on-call person directly from Slack.
instructions:
1. Connect your Better Uptime account (you can sign up via Cloudflare)
2. Enter your phone number (optional)
2. Done! We call you when your website goes down
author: Better Uptime

failure.message: Error occurred. It's not your fault. We'll fix it soon.

help.helpvalue: Hey! Please, navigate to https://betteruptime.com and fill out your contact details. We'll alert you by email or phone call when your website goes down.
